tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance
quoteText:
Terms of Use or other notice will constitute your acceptance of such changes or modifications.
Otherwise, any changes or modifications will be effective within thirty (30) days of the posting of the revisions on the Site unless you notify SmugMug within such thirty (30) days that you do not agree to the changes and stop using the Services.
